bibl.title: A Memnonian Family in a Visit to the Sanctuary of Amenhotep and Imhotep in Deir el-Bahari, June 6th, 119 A.D.
Essays in Honour of Prof. Dr. Jadwiga Lipinska
bibl.author: LAJTAR, Adam

bibl.note: Communication présentée au XXIe Congrès de Papyrologie à Berlin en septembre 1995. - Nouvelle édition de: André BATAILLE, Les inscriptions grecques du temple de Hatshepsout à Deir el-Bahari (Le Caire, 1951) pp. 57-58, Nos 82 + 82 bis.
LAJTAR Adam, A Memnonian Family in a Visit to the Sanctuary of Amenhotep and Imhotep in Deir el-Bahari, June 6th, 119 A.D.
Essays in Honour of Prof. Dr. Jadwiga Lipinska = Warsaw Egyptological Studies. I (Warsaw, 1997) pp. 35-44, 3 fac-sim., 1 plan.
